General_Description: '''Disappearing Act''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[Sparta]]n spy discovered [[Followers of Ares]] preying on locals. He was unable to act or get a message to his Commander for fear the Followers would escape.
